question:
Which of the following statements is correct about the Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA)?
  1. It is a centrally sponsored scheme of “vocationalisation” of secondary and higher secondary education.
  2. The scheme is being implemented by the State government societies established for implementation of the scheme.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: Both are correct statements Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA) is a centrally sponsored scheme of vocationalisation of secondary and higher education in the country. It focuses on enhancing the employability of youth through demand-driven, competency-based, modular vocational courses, while reducing drop-out rates. The major objective of the scheme is to enhance access and improve quality of education at the secondary stage while ensuring equity. The umbrella scheme of RMSA will be implemented at state level by RMSA societies established particularly for this work.
